author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Shanghai Daimay Automotive Interior to pay A shares div for FY 2017 on April 23
text:
April 17 (Reuters) - Shanghai Daimay Automotive Interior Co Ltd :
* Says it will pay cash dividend of 0.50 yuan(before tax)/share for 2017 to shareholders of record on April 20
* The companyâ€™s shares will be traded ex-right and ex-dividend on April 23 and the dividend will be paid on April 23
